articles.description: Follow live build-up to the 2023 Sports Personality of the Year as the show celebrates its 70th show.
articles.title: Sports Personality of the Year 2023 - follow build-up to 70th show

articles.description: Follow live text updates as Manchester City play Urawa Red Diamonds in the Club World Cup.
articles.title: Club World Cup: Urawa Reds v Man City - team news & build-up

articles.title: EFL Cup: Build-up to three quarter-finals, including Chelsea v Newcastle

articles.description: Australia bowler Mitchell Starc becomes the most expensive signing in Indian Premier League history on being bought by Kolkata Knight Riders.
articles.title: Starc breaks record for most expensive buy at IPL

articles.description: Liverpool forward Darwin Nunez is "full of fire" and cannot only be judged on goals, says assistant boss Pep Lijnders.
articles.title: Nunez 'full of fire' as Liverpool host Hammers

articles.description: Nottingham Forest sack manager Steve Cooper, who led them to promotion in 2022, after one win in their past six Premier League games.
articles.title: Forest confirm Cooper sacking & in talks with Nuno

articles.description: Thomas Muller signs a one-year contract extension with Bayern Munich, where he has spent 15 years and made 684 appearances.
articles.title: Muller signs one-year Bayern contract extension

articles.description: Football's lawmakers have no plans to regulate shin pad dimensions despite concerns over their shrinking size.
articles.title: No plans to regulate shin pad sizes - Ifab

articles.description: Pep Guardiola has changed the role of the full-back. Former Germany and Bayern Munich defender Philipp Lahm tells BBC Sport why and how it has been done.
articles.title: Why full-backs will never be same again

articles.description: Drew Lock throws a touchdown pass with just 28 seconds remaining as the Seattle Seahawks keep their play-off hopes alive with a dramatic victory over the Philadelphia Eagles.
articles.title: Lock inspires Seahawks to win over Eagles
